name: Platform 9.8
description:
Platform 9.8 is my submission to the 2018 GMTK GameJam. It is a platformer without gravity. It is a prototype more than an actual game, but still rather enjoyable, and I spent enough time on it that I thought I would share it.

Look-direction is controlled by the arrow keys, jump with 'c', grapple with 'x', and pull with 'z' (while grappled). The character is orange, the goal blue. Red will kill you.

This is the first fully fledged game I've made, so let me know what you think.
